projectList.title: QNote
projectList.subtitle: BLAZING FAST NOTE TAKING
projectList.text: It opens in milliseconds and closes when you lock your phone. Perfect for noting homeworks without getting the teacher's attention.

projectList.title: IPManager
projectList.subtitle: DHCP MADE EASY
projectList.text: If a workplace uses static IP and the employees carry their computers between their homes and offices everyday, it changes DHCP settings automatically.

projectList.title: PhotoSec
projectList.subtitle: SECURE YOUR PHOTOS!
projectList.text: Select some photos from the phoneâ€™s gallery and password protect them. Oh, and there is a fake password feature!

projectList.title: Today's Meal in Marmara
projectList.subtitle: MEAL IN A DIFFERENT FORM
projectList.text: I wonder if today's meal is delicious or not. I have to check the school's website and... I wish it came as a notification.

projectList.imageAlt: a ship sailing on the sea
projectList.title: Rocky Journey
projectList.subtitle: AN FPGA GAME
projectList.text: A game written in Verilog HDL that runs on an FPGA. Drives an LED matrix and uses several hardware buttons for inputs.

projectList.imageAlt: iMac showing the source code of this website
projectList.title: Personal Website
projectList.subtitle: BUILT USING LATEST TECH
projectList.text: Open source website built using React. A lot of design work and an interactive CV built into it! I also streamed myself building it!
